query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as failed_count 
FROM email_logs 
WHERE tenant = 'vinces' 
  AND status = 'failed' 
  AND sentAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2E4HaJUB1R41J12.fcd4ff42607d --database H86jcAdP392wwbWXRcEDMs --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as failed_count 
FROM email_logs 
WHERE tenant = 'vinces' 
  AND status = 'failed' 
  AND sentAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
